summary: THE DRIVER AND PASSENGER SEAT COLLAPSED WHEN ANOTHER CAR  REAR ENDED THE CONSUMERS VEHICLE.  THE OTHER VEHICLE WAS TRAVELING AT 55 MPH. AS A RESULT THE DRIVER AND PASSENGER WERE INJURED.   *NLM   *AK   THE VEHICLE WAS TOTALED.  THE RECLINING MECHANISM FAILED AND THE BACKS OF THE SEATS RECLINED AND AS A RESULT THE DRIVER AND PASSENGER ENDED UP IN THE BACK SEAT OF THE EXTENDED CAB.   *SCC
